name: Renz Marvin Eullo
text: As someone who plays both Dota and fighting games, 1v1 fighting games are more casual friendly for reasons other than win-loss: community, toxicity, smurfing, and maybe some emotional/ psychological aspects too.

source_obj.text: As someone who plays both Dota and fighting games, 1v1 fighting games are more casual friendly for reasons other than win-loss: community, toxicity, smurfing, and maybe some emotional/ psychological aspects too.
